title: [Cancer] Drinking several cups of coffee every day may be linked to a lower risk of developing prostate cancer, suggests a pooled data analysis of the available evidence. Each additional daily cup of the brew was associated with a reduction in relative risk of nearly 1%, the findings indicate.
[Medicine] Breathing Easier with a Better Tracheal Stent Pitt. Researchers Demonstrate First Successful Use of Biodegradable Magnesium-alloy Stent for Pediatric Patients.
